body.name: Baby Sound Machine, Momcozy White Noise Machine for Baby Sleeping with Night Light, Toddler Sleep Trainer with 34 Soothing Sounds, Timer, App Remote Control, Personal Sleep Routine (Blue)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 12 hrs 19 mins
features: 【Multiple Soothing Sounds】34 high-fidelity sounds (11 white noises, 3 fan sounds,8 lullabies and 12 nature sounds) ,40~110dB, let you choose the ideal background to mask intruding noises and create the perfect environment for work, study, sleep or an upset baby.

【Night Light】An adjustable, soft LED luminous lamp provides sufficient, but not too harsh, light for your bedroom at midnight. There are also 7 color light offerings, Baby sound machine is perfect as a nightstand lamp, baby nursery light, relaxing lamp, romantic atmosphere light etc.

【Convenient to use】Smart light can be adjusted remotely via phone, can be tapped on manually as needed or soft-touch. Control remotely via the free companion app. Device requires Wi-Fi.(Please be aware to use a 2.4G network, 5G wifi is not compatible.)Please note：needs to be plugged in for use.

【Sleep Better】With sound machine, enjoy soothing content to help you wind down and prepare your mind & body for sleep. Personalize a sleep-wake routine to help you fall asleep, stay asleep & wake up refreshed.
【Custom settings】The white noise machine can customize color, brightness, sound, and volume level. Set programs to turn off and on automatically based on your family’s sleep schedule.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: The app was easy to set up! Nice to be able to control all options from your phone. Has many sounds and different light colors. Easy to change brightness of the light and the volume of the sound all from the app. Also has a child lock so the settings can not be messed with even if your child pushes the buttons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the money. Simple, yet does everything I need.
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research on sound machines before buying this one. I looked really hard at a Hatch, but it seemed expensive and overly complicated. This machine has great sound options and different colors, but I only ever use one sound and one light. I like that the buttons are easy and I can turn it off and on in the dark with a baby in my arms. Having the app control is nice so that I can check on it while I'm out of the room, but I hardly use it. My favorite part about the machine is it’s portability. If the power goes out in the middle of the night, I know it will keep going. I can easily take it to grandparents house for a nap and not worry about chargers or finding a plug in. I even use it in the car for long trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves this and so does me and my boyfriend. This has so many sounds, tons of colors, and different things you can do. The app is easy to use too. Totally love this thing and 100% worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use it for my dog
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my dog because he gets anxious and feisty at times and barks non-stop. I noticed that if I play the 10-hour white noise video on YouTube he calms down. Instead of playing that I got this and it worked just as well but now I have a multitude of sounds options, soothing light options, and even a timer. It’s really great! Aesthetically, it looks great in the room too! We’re very happy with our purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great, I love that it has the option to create a schedule on the app. One issue when you create a schedule is that the noise machine will stop and then start back up. I was hoping to use this as a way to tell my toddler he can get out of bed with a green light, but if he is still sleeping the stopping of the noise wakes him. Also, uses WiFi, so it always says that it’s disconnected even after I have reconnected WiFi a handful of times. Still works without WiFi, just not as useful as I was hoping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Momcozy Sound Machine, and it has quickly become an essential part of my nightly routine. The variety of calming sounds, from gentle ocean waves to soothing lullabies, creates a tranquil environment that helps me unwind and promotes restful sleep. The compact design fits seamlessly into my bedroom, and the adjustable volume ensures I can customize the ambiance to my liking. The timer function is a convenient addition, allowing me to set it for a specific duration. Overall, the Momcozy Sound Machine delivers on its promise to create a peaceful sanctuary for a good night's sleep. Highly recommended for those seeking a reliable and effective sound machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A Promising Start, but Disappointing Longevity
reviews.reviewText: I initially loved this product, especially the extensive collection of songs that kept my baby entertained right from day one. The combination of vibrant lighting and engaging tunes created a delightful atmosphere that my little one thoroughly enjoyed.However, my enthusiasm took a sharp turn when, unexpectedly, the music suddenly ceased playing. The LED lights still function, providing a visually stimulating environment, but the primary feature – the music – has unfortunately stopped working altogether. Despite my efforts to troubleshoot the issue using online resources and the product's app, I've hit a dead end.Adding to the frustration is the inability to open the product for a closer look inside. The lack of transparency in terms of design accessibility makes it challenging to identify the root cause of the malfunction. Even with a full charge, the product remains silent, leaving my baby without the soothing melodies that were once a cherished part of our routine.Additionally, the product's app, which I had hoped would assist in troubleshooting, proved to be unhelpful in resolving the issue. This lack of support adds to the disappointment, leaving me with a non-functional product and no clear path to a resolution.In conclusion, while the product brought joy initially, its sudden malfunction and the lack of effective troubleshooting options have left me feeling disheartened. It's disconcerting to invest in a product that seemingly has a limited lifespan, especially when its core functionality becomes compromised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love that this is accessible through a app on your phone, my daughter loves so many of the sounds and it provides a good amount of light during night feedings. She developed colic and we swear this is the reason she still sleeps well. There are also so many color options as well. Additionally this takes a type C charger which is extremely convenient.

I decided to buy this machine as I needed a lamp and a white noise machine. And I'm so glad i found it. The 2 white noise machines that I have always turns off its own and it's not easy to move and stretch to turn it back on while carrying/feeding a light sleeper baby. It has many sound options though I frequently use the lullaby option and turn on the white orangey light. I love how I can control the intensity of the light as well, to the dimmest when my 7mo is asleep. And I would lower down the volume before turning it off eventually too. Sometimes when my son is awake, I would play the good morning sound and on the colourful lights just for fun. There's also a timer option for when I want the machine to switch off but I've not use it yet. I wish I have gotten this machine sooner. The only thing that I wish for is for my husband to be able to pair the machine to his phone without the app logging me out automatically. It seems that only 1 person can pair it to their phone. But it's okay, when my phone is out of reach, I can physically press the on button and it will auto on to the previous setting. If you're thinking of a smart white noise machine that doubles up as a lamp, this is it!
Died and would not turn on or charge after one use. Otherwise, app is great and easy to use.
